languages.text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.
languages.original_text: Рыцарские миры играют ключевую роль в обороне Империума в бесчисленных секторах. С помощью гигантских боевых машин они защищают своих союзников от инопланетных захватчиков и еретиков.

traits.locale_text: Knight Worlds are vital lynchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive humanoid war machines.
Knight Worlds are vital lynchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive humanoid war machines.
Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.

languages.text: Рыцарские миры играют ключевую роль в обороне Империума в бесчисленных секторах. С помощью гигантских боевых машин они защищают своих союзников от инопланетных захватчиков и еретиков.

Ritterwelten sind in zahllosen Sektoren wichtige Dreh- und Angelpunkte hinsichtlich der Verteidigung des Imperiums und schützen ihre Verbündeten mit Hilfe ihrer gewaltigen Kampfschiffe vor außerirdischen und ketzerischen Eindringlingen.
languages.original_text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.

traits.locale_text: Ritterwelten sind in zahllosen Sektoren wichtige Dreh- und Angelpunkte in der Verteidigung des Imperiums und schützen ihre Verbündeten mit Hilfe ihrer gewaltigen Kampfschiffe vor außerirdischen und ketzerischen Eindringlingen.

languages.text: On ne compte plus les secteurs dans lesquels les mondes-chevaliers jouent un rôle défensif déterminant pour l'Imperium en protégeant leurs alliés des envahisseurs xénos et hérétiques à l'aide de leurs gigantesques marcheurs de combat.
languages.original_text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.

traits.locale_text: On ne compte plus les secteurs dans lesquels les Mondes-Chevaliers jouent un rôle défensif déterminant pour l'Imperium en protégeant leurs alliés des envahisseurs xénos et hérétiques à l'aide de leurs gigantesques marcheurs de combat.

languages.text: 骑士世界是帝国在无数星区内的关键防御组织。骑士世界会派遣庞大的步行机甲，帮助盟友击退异端分子与异形的侵略。
languages.original_text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.

traits.locale_text: 骑士世界是帝国在无数星区内的关键防御组织。骑士世界会派遣庞大的步行机甲，帮助盟友击退异端分子与异形的侵略。

languages.text: 騎士惑星はの帝国の防衛に欠かせない重要な基軸であり、巨大なコンバットウォーカーの助けを借りて、異星人や異端者の侵略から同盟国を守っている。
languages.original_text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.

traits.locale_text: 騎士惑星はの帝国の防衛に欠かせない重要な基軸であり、巨大なコンバットウォーカーの助けを借りて、異星人や異端者の侵略から同盟国を守っている。

languages.text: Los mundos caballero son el brazo ejecutor de las defensas del Imperium en infinidad de sectores. Protegen a sus aliados de invasores alienígenas y herejes con la ayuda de sus enormes bípodes de combate.
languages.original_text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.

traits.locale_text: Los mundos caballero son el brazo ejecutor de las defensas del Imperium en infinidad de sectores. Protegen a sus aliados de invasores alienígenas y herejes con la ayuda de sus enormes bípodes de combate.

languages.text: Şövalye Dünyalar, İmparatorluk'un sayısız sektördeki savunmasında hayati rol oynayan temel taşlarıdır. Yürüyen devasa ölüm makinelerinin yardımıyla müttefiklerini uzaylılardan ve kâfir istilacılardan korurlar.
languages.original_text: Knight worlds are vital linchpins in the Imperium's defence in countless sectors, protecting their allies from alien and heretic invaders with the help of their massive combat walkers.
